listText: Why would I need a guest user?
DetailedText1: Guest Users are secondary users with account access who can help manage the account. Example of guest users: Building Managers, Caretakers.

listText: How many guest users can I add?
DetailedText1: You may add up to 5 guest users.

listText: What is the difference between a guest user and a co-applicant?
DetailedText1: While both a Guest User and Co-Applicant can help manage the account, a Co-Applicant is also partly responsible for payment.
